page.title: 16WIDNES-INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: { Alice Bond}aged 82 lives in {Ethel {Hanley House.}Her Dad used to come from Wolverhampton to Widnes on a narrow boat using 62 horses,leaving them at different stages along the canal.They would then go home after collecting iron ore.If her father stopped for a drink he would tie up Bessie the horse,but she would break the line and return home on her own,as she didn't like to stop.Alice was 9 when her family settled in Widnes.Her father worked in the{Iron Foundry.}She was involved in a train disaster at Ditton Junction and was buried under rubble for 8 hours. { Tom Webster}has a small farm in Widnes.When he was a young man there were lots of farms in{Ditton }and he used to plough the fields. Linacre Farm and Gatwell Farm grow barley and oats.Linacre Farm has over 30 horses.
